note.p: Daughter of John and Mary Bloss of Boreham, Essex. Married Thomas Dixon of St Alphege’s, Greenwich, at Boreham, Essex, in 1784. Buried at Broomfield, Essex.
Essex Record Office baptism registers (D/P 29/1/2 image 34), marriage registers (D/P 29/1/4 p. 30), burial registers (D/P 248/1/7 p. 33)
